mean_cn: n. 文艺复兴，新生，复兴
mean_en: the period of European history between the 14th and 17th centuries when there was a new interest in science and in ancient art and literature especially in Italy
word_etyma: re 重新 + naiss诞生 + ance 表名词， 情况、性质、行为 → n. 复活,复兴,文艺复兴
sentence: Shakespeare was the representative writer of the Renaissance.
sentence_trans: 莎士比亚是文艺复兴时期的代表作家。
